GSD.description:
powerpc/rtas: avoid scheduling in rtas_os_term()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit bed48651c87bef59ea1a9d6dbc381bcbc452f4ff. For more details please see the references link.
